title: Old diaries, 1881-1901 /
author: Gower, Ronald Sutherland
snippet: He was a friend who could not be replaced,and I have never ceased missing his genial individuality. On the 2nd of May I attended a Requiem Mass fordear Percy Ffrench at St John's Church, in Great OrmondStreet. It was not impressive — a long and tediousservice.
